Detailed Description

SenStore database server client connection helper.

Member Function Documentation

def scshm.database.client.SenStoreClient.SenStoreClient.__init__ (   self,
  config,
  name = 'Python client',
  exclusive = False 
)

Initializes the client connection.

The client connects to the server, starts a session, and retrieves the database manager and inspector proxies. It also starts a SessionRefresher daemon to keep the session alive.

An exclusive session should only be used when absolutely necessary, as it will block access to the server by other clients until this session is ended by calling close() or exiting the client application.

Parameters:
config client configuration
name (optional) client session name
exclusive (optional) create an exclusive access session
def scshm.database.client.SenStoreClient.SenStoreClient.close (   self  ) 

Closes the connection.

The SessionRefresher daemon is stopped, the session ended, and the connection to the server closed. After calling this method this object can no longer be used.
